segments.text: I'm just observing this kitchen, and I feel a bit overwhelmed by the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer amount of water flooding onto the floor is quite alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's flowing over the sink's edge in a continuous, unstoppable sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This means the lower cabinets are getting completely soaked right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Just imagine the extensive water damage that's going to occur there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The wood will certainly warp, and probably mold will start to grow later on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman doesn't even seem to notice the puddle soaking her own foot!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a rather unsanitary and truly unpleasant situation, really.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the calm, clean garden outside is almost cruelly ironic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, it's a slow-motion catastrophe unfolding before our eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the dampness and the sticky sensation on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is definitely not a pleasant environment to be in for long.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone addresses this quickly before it gets much worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a truly messy and avoidable situation, honestly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The complete obliviousness of the adult is simply astounding.
segments.speaker: PAR
